feed.title: Premesti se
feed.subtitle: Premesti Se Vesti o preme≈°tanju dece u vrtiƒáima i ostalim sliƒçnim temama.

entry.title: Advantages of fast repospond
entry.content:
We have noticed that many users enter a wish but do not check their email messages so as to confuse other users with whom the match occurs. On the other hand, coincidences occur in raids, ie. one new wish generally makes about four or five possible rotations of different lengths. Therefore, the speed of responding to the rotation notification is very important, because whoever is a girl before, a girl to him.

In order to reward active users, we have introduced sharing on Facebook, both when making wishes and when making agreements. Who does not want to waste time with this sharing, can buy coffee and thus prove that he is an active user.

Active users deserve to be notified first.
entry.summary: We have noticed that many users enter a wish but do not check their email messages so as to confuse other users with whom the match occurs. On the other hand, coincidences occur in raids, ie. one new wish generally makes about four or five possible rotations of different lengths. Therefore, the speed of responding to the rotation notification is very important, because whoever is a girl before, a girl to him.

entry.title: Prednosti brzog javljanja
entry.content:
Primetili smo da mnogi korisnici upisu ≈æelju ali ne proveravaju svoje imejl poruke tako da zbunjuju ostale korisnike sa kojima se desi poklapanje. Sa druge strane, poklapanja se de≈°avaju u naletima, tj. jedna nova ≈æelja uglavnom napravi oko ƒçetiri pet moguƒáih rotacija razliƒçite du≈æine. Stoga brzina odgovaranja na obave≈°tenju o rotaciji je veoma va≈æna, jer ko pre devojci, njemu devojka.

Da bi smo nagradili aktivne korisnike, uveli smo sherovanje na facebook-u i to prilikom pravljenja ≈æelja i prilikom nastajanja dogovaranja. Ko ne ≈æeli da gubi vreme tim sherovanjem, mo≈æe da kupi kafu i tako doka≈æe da je aktivni korisnik.

Aktivni korisnici zaslu≈æuju da prvi dobiju obave≈°tenja.
entry.summary: Primetili smo da mnogi korisnici upisu ≈æelju ali ne proveravaju svoje imejl poruke tako da zbunjuju ostale korisnike sa kojima se desi poklapanje. Sa druge strane, poklapanja se de≈°avaju u naletima, tj. jedna nova ≈æelja uglavnom napravi oko ƒçetiri pet moguƒáih rotacija razliƒçite du≈æine. Stoga brzina odgovaranja na obave≈°tenju o rotaciji je veoma va≈æna, jer ko pre devojci, njemu devojka.

entry.title: Successful relocations in kindergartens
entry.content:
We made this service out of our need to transfer the child to a closer kindergarten (we have not succeeded yet and that is why we are still improving the site (üë∑).

But when we get the news that other children have managed to switch, we are even happier üß° and it gives us an incentive to keep this (free) service active.

Thanks for the kind words of support.
entry.summary: We made this service out of our need to transfer the child to a closer kindergarten (we have not succeeded yet and that is why we are still improving the site (üë∑).

entry.title: Uspe≈°na preme≈°tanja u vrtiƒáima
entry.content:
Ovaj servis smo napravili iz na≈°e potrebe da prebacimo dete u bli≈æi vrtiƒá (nismo jo≈° uvek uspeli i zato jo≈° uvek unapreƒëujemo sajt üë∑).

Ali kada dobijemo vest da su druga deca uspela da se prebace, to nam je jo≈° vi≈°e drago üß° i to nam daje podstrek da ovaj (besplatan) servis i dalje dr≈æimo aktivnim.

Hvala na lepim reƒçima podr≈°ke.
entry.summary: Ovaj servis smo napravili iz na≈°e potrebe da prebacimo dete u bli≈æi vrtiƒá (nismo jo≈° uvek uspeli i zato jo≈° uvek unapreƒëujemo sajt üë∑).

entry.title: Remote kindergarten is not such a bad thing

link.title: Remote kindergarten is not such a bad thing

entry.content:
We are all thinking about how to have everything at our fingertips, to have a kindergarten and a shop and a doctor and SPENS nearby ‚Ä¶

But when you get into a situation where you have to travel, then you realize that it's not that bad. For example, we lived across the street from the kindergarten and each time we got up at 5min to 8 and were late for breakfast. Out of bed, not yet awake, it looked the same every morning.

Now that our kindergarten is 5km away it looks much better. We get up earlier because we know we should do our best to arrive on time. We choose different variants of transportation (on foot, bus, bike, car), but we like the bike the most. We arrive at the kindergarten blushing and hungry üòã üòã and after this morning activity, we are ready for the whole day.

On my way home, I take the opportunity to stop by some parks along the way and do some exercises so I can sit quietly at the computer afterwards. I liked that morning recreation so much that I started applying for marathons and triathlons. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve been in better shape in my life, all thanks to a remote kindergarten.
entry.summary: We are all thinking about how to have everything at our fingertips, to have a kindergarten and a shop and a doctor and SPENS nearby ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Udaljen vrtiƒá i nije tako lo≈°a stvar

link.title: Udaljen vrtiƒá i nije tako lo≈°a stvar

entry.content:
Svi mi razmi≈°ljamo kako da nam sve bude na dohvat ruke, da nam je u blizini i vrtiƒá i prodavnica i doktor i SPENS‚Ä¶

Ali kada doƒëete u situaciju da morate da putujete onda shvatite da to i nije tako lo≈°e. Na primer, mi smo ≈æiveli preko puta vrtiƒáa i svaki put smo ustajali u 5min do 8 i kasnili na doruƒçak. Onako iz kreveta, jo≈° ne razbuƒëeni, svako jutro je izgledalo isto.

Sada kada nam je vrtiƒá udaljen 5km to izgleda mnogo bolje. Ustajemo ranije po≈°to znamo da treba dobro da se potrudimo da stignemo na vreme. Biramo razliƒçite varijante prevoza (pe≈°ke, bus, bajs, auto), ali nam se najvi≈°e sviƒëa biciklo. Dolazimo u vrtiƒá rumeni i gladni üòÑ üòã i posle ove jutarnje aktivnosti, spremni smo za ceo dan.

Dok se vraƒáam kuƒái, ja iskoristim priliku da svratim u nekih usputnih parkova i uradim ve≈æbe kako bih mogao posle da sedim mirno za raƒçunarom. Ta jutarnja rekreacija mi se toliko svidela da sam poƒçeo da se prijavljujem na maratone i triatlone. Mislim da u ≈æivotu nisam bio u boljoj formi, a sve zahvaljujuƒái udaljenom vrtiƒáu.
entry.summary: Svi mi razmi≈°ljamo kako da nam sve bude na dohvat ruke, da nam je u blizini i vrtiƒá i prodavnica i doktor i SPENS‚Ä¶
